Input 0
41 jets
5 rocks
should repeat after 205

205 stones => 316 height

>>> 1000000000000 // 205
4878048780

4878048780 * 205 = 999999999900 height

1000000000000 - 4878048780 * 205 = 100 left to do

so add 157

4878048780 * 205 + 157

===============================================================
Input 1
5 10091 50455

=5*5*10091*10091

After 50455 stones 77546
After 2 * 50455 stones 155116

Input 0

41 jets
5 rocks
should repeat after 205

>>> 1000000000000 // 205
4878048780

1000000000000 - 205 * 4878048780 = 100

remaining 157

205 * 4878048780 + 157 = 1000000000057

my small vs real small

1514285714288
